widgets.name: Compliance Status
widgets.content: Displays the current compliance status of your cloud environment, highlighting any non-compliance issues.

widgets.name: Risk Assessment Overview
widgets.content: Provides an overview of potential risks in your cloud infrastructure, including severity and potential impact.

widgets.name: Vulnerability Alerts
widgets.content: Shows recent vulnerabilities detected in your cloud services and recommended actions to mitigate them.

widgets.name: Security Policies
widgets.content: Lists the active security policies in your cloud environment and their current compliance status.

widgets.name: Incident History
widgets.content: Tracks and displays historical security incidents, including their resolution status and impact.

widgets.name: Data Encryption Status
widgets.content: Monitors and reports on the encryption status of your cloud-stored data and compliance with encryption standards.

widgets.name: User Access Audit
widgets.content: Audits user access to your cloud resources, showing who has access and any recent changes.

widgets.name: Security Group Configurations
widgets.content: Displays the current configurations of security groups in your cloud environment, highlighting any misconfigurations.

widgets.name: Cloud Asset Inventory
widgets.content: Provides a comprehensive inventory of all cloud assets, including their status and compliance with security standards.

widgets.name: Service Health Monitoring
widgets.content: Monitors the health of cloud services and components, showing current status and any reported issues.

widgets.name: Compliance Reports
widgets.content: Monitor the threats and generate some compliance reports, showing current issues related.

widgets.name: Security Posture Assessment
widgets.content: Assess the security posture of your cloud environment and provide recommendations for improvement.
